body.name: Sweetnight King Size Mattress, 10 Inch Memory Foam King Mattress with Three Firmness Levels in One Mattress, Infused Gel for Cool Sleep, King Foam Mattress in a Box,Grey
body.description: Sweetnight Gel Memory Foam Mattress - Sleep Tight, Rise Bright! What makes us different from others?Flippable Design - Experience three firmness feelings in one mattress.Cooling Technology - Infused cooling gel keeps you away from hot all night.Curve Foam Structure - Conform to body shape to relieve joint pressure.Luxurious Jacquard Pattern - Make your bedroom more elegant.CertiPUR-US Certified - Let you sleep safer and healthier.No Risk - 10-Year warranty protects your consumer rights.What is in the box?1x Sweetnight 10 Inch King Mattress 1x Sweetnight Sleep Opener 1x Manual Card Tips for Unpacking:Place your mattress wherever you intend to sleep and unbox it.Position your mattress on any solid base and cut the outer plastic with Sweetnight opener.Roll out the compressed mattress and allow it to fully inflate for about 72 hours.Enjoy and sleep tight with your Sweetnight mattress.Note:- Do not be alarmed, if it has a slight odor. It is normal with new foam. Let the mattress air out for 3 days would be helpful.- Everyone's idea of firmness varies. We recommend sleeping on this mattress for a few weeks in order to give your mattress a chance to “break-in” to the way you sleep. If you still can't sleep well, please feel free to contact us at any time, we always standby to assist as you're our much-valued customer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Maximum Breathability The mattress cover is made from breathable fabric that allows you to keep cool. The cooling gel memory foam is CertiPUR-US certified, which is assured for you to have a safe and cool sleep. Versatile Sweetnight memory foam mattresses can be used in various rooms with different bed frames such as the floor, a slatted base, box spring or a flat platform. Mattress in a Box We compress the foam mattress and ship it in a box to your door conveniently. It’s easy to carry and set up. We recommend inflating about 72 hours before enjoying our mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mattress for our guest room so that my parents could stay over more often. They preferred a king size, so I bought this one. I was initially worried about how it would he shipped because a king bed is so big, but it came in a really cool small box. It was wrapped up airtight, and when I unrolled it, it expanded into a king size. I really liked how easy it was to get set up on the bed frame. Things I really like about it are: 1. It’s very comfortable! It feels like a memory foam mattress. When you touch it, it moves around my fingers. My father fell asleep on it the second day, even before we had the sheets on it. Lol. 2. It was very easy to set up. It took me under 10 minutes total. I took it out of the box, took it out of the plastic and it expanded over the next day or so. I took pictures to show because it was pretty neat. 3. The price was great for the value. Overall, I’m very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pain relief firm mattress, high quality material, stain resistant
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is the second one I bought. First one was a full size for my guest room; turned out super comfortable that kids and I like to sleep on it; form enough to support my back, and soft enough to relax my muscles. This king size one doesn’t disappoint me either. It is so comfortable that my wife likes it so much. We use the most firm side, holds two adults and three kids with no problems. Sleeping on it for a week, pressure relief, feels very good, no more back sores or pain. The color of the mattress is gray to black with water flow strips, beautiful design. The mattress is not easy to get dirty, some water or stain can be easily cleaned or wiped off. I highly recommend it. The package is compact and air sealed very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the reversible design.
reviews.reviewText: This is the replacement for my 5-year-old mattress which gave me a lot of back and hip soreness in the mornings. As expected, the newbie packaged well, easily setup, and no bad smell at all. First few nights, the mattress feels maybe a little too soft to me since I'm just not used to sinking into my bed. So I flipped it over and used the bottom side. Now it proved to be just the right amount of support for me, and I've been sleeping very well every night since. No back or hip pain, and don't feel like laying on a giant marshmallow. I like this reversible design and I would give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great comfortable sleeping
reviews.reviewText: Great mattress at a great price. After researching many mattresses, I came across this one, and I have to tell you I love this mattress. It expanded nicely after opening shrink wrap. Feels like a soft-medium, not true medium, as far as firmness. Firm yet also very soft. After more than a week, I am still sleeping well. It has just the right amount of foam that gives enough cushion to prevent my back pain . It took me about 2 days for the corners to fully pop all the way up so don’t get discouraged if it’s not complete after the 24 hours. Only thing I dislike is the edges are a little flimsy so you can't sleep directly on the edge or you will roll off but who sleeps right on the edge when you have such a big bed anyways? so worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True Experience: Very Comfy
reviews.reviewText: I am here for correct guidance. I bought this mattress because i was not happy with my old mattress. I want to buy something good and comfy mattress and this is the only one because after pregnancy I have back problem and this mattress feel me so so enjoyable. Now my mornings are so much better with this mattress. I can change both side it’s Flippable design. most important things is as per my back pain experience now it’s feel so better than before because they said this mattress has a good curve foam structure. After all this best factor, plus point is this is available in reasonable. I would highly recommend this mattress from my true experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slept like a baby!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical on ordering one of the mattresses that come in a box, but when we moved into our new place we had to get box split box springs to get them up the steps and it was going to be difficult to get a regular queen mattress up the steps, so we decided to go with one that is boxed.I looked at several of these types before deciding in this one and it was not the wrong choice, I LOOOVVEEE this mattress!!! It is comfortable and firm and I love that it’s so thick! It’s been about three weeks now and I have not had any back pain from it and have slept like a baby!It’s definitely worthy the price and I am considering getting another for my kids once they grow out of their single beds. (Excuse the mess in the photos, we are still unpacking!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed sinks in the middle and give you the worst lower back pain ever. I hate this bad!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm enough to get a good sleep
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mattress for my guest bed room. I am very particular about the firmness of the mattress I don’t like soft ones. This mattress is firm enough not too soft not too hard. It doesn’t cave in when we sleep on it. The mattress is neatly packed in a air tight bag. Have to mention that there is no smell when the package was opened. It expanded well after leaving it for 24 hours. The best part, the mattress comes with a cover which makes it very easy to maintain especially with kids who jumped on it even before I put the sheets.Overall it’s a good buy.
